Event.name: Deception_end
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Deceiver</fen> succeeds or fails in causing a <fen>Victim</fen> to have a misunderstanding about a <fen>Topic</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Victim</fen> is the target of the deception.</def-root>

Arg.name: Deceiver
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Deceiver</fen> attempts to make the <fen>Victim</fen> unable to know about or detect the truth about a <fen>Phenomenon</fen> or <fen>Topic</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Phenomenon
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is presented to the <fen>Victim</fen> as a way to mislead about the <fen>Topic</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Topic
Arg.definition: <def-root>The entity to which the misleading idea relates, what it is about.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location where the deception fails or succeeds.</def-root>
